page.title: 06Places of Worship in Woking.
page.content: This block contains churches of many denominations. The Sheerwater Estate has the Roman Catholic Church of St. John the Evangelist at one end of its parade of shops and St. Michael's Shared Church at the other. This latter recently built church is shared by Anglicans and Methodists and is a daughter church of the high Anglican Church of All Saints, Woodham. Another Anglican church, St. Paul's, is situated in Oriental Road opposite the Mosque. The nuns of St. Peter's Convent worship in their chapel on Maybury Hill close to St.Columba's, a retreat house belonging to the Anglican diocese of Guildford. Trinity Methodist Church is in Brewery Road and Courtenay Free Church in Walton Road.
